TYPO3 Colors

  • TYPO3 Key Color Hex: #ff8700 RGB: 255/135/0 CMYK: 0/56/100/0 Pantone: Orange 021C
  • Support Orange light Hex: #ff9f33 RGB: 255/153/38 CMYK: 0/40/85/0
  • Support Orange dark Hex: #e67a00 RGB: 230/122/0 CMYK: 0/47/100/10
  • Marker Orange Hex: #ffd095 RGB: 255/208/149 CMYK: 0/23/46/10
  • White Hex: #ffffff RGB: 255/255/255 CMYK: 0/0/0/0
  • Grey superlight Hex: #f4f4f4 RGB: 244/244/244 CMYK: 0/0/0/8
  • Grey light Hex: #b9b9b9 RGB: 185/185/185 CMYK: 0/0/0/27 Pantone: Cool Gray 5
  • Grey medium Hex: #8c8c8c RGB: 140/140/140 CMYK: 0/0/0/45 Pantone: Cool Gray 8
  • Grey dark Hex: #515151 RGB: 81/81/81 CMYK: 0/0/0/68 Pantone: Cool Gray 11
  • Black Hex: #000000 RGB: 0/0/0 CMYK: 0/0/0/100 Pantone: Black C

Message Colors

  • Valid Message green Hex: #5abc55 RGB: 90/188/85
  • Warning Message yellow Hex: #ffc800 RGB: 255/2000/0
  • Error Message red Hex: #dd123d RGB: 221/18/61
  • Information Message blue Hex: #0080ff RGB: 0/128/255

HTML

									
										<ul class="sg-colors message-colors">
	<li>
		<span class="sg-swatch" style="background:#5abc55;"></span>
		<span class="sg-label">Valid Message green</span>
		<span class="sg-label">Hex: #5abc55</span>
		<span class="sg-label">RGB: 90/188/85</span>
	</li>
	<li>
		<span class="sg-swatch" style="background: #ffc800;"></span>

		<span class="sg-label">RGB: 255/2000/0</span>
    </li>
	<li>
		<span class="sg-swatch" style="background: #dd123d;"></span>
		<span class="sg-label">Error Message red</span>
		<span class="sg-label">Hex: #dd123d</span>
		<span class="sg-label">RGB: 221/18/61</span>
	</li>
    <li>
		<span class="sg-swatch" style="background: #0080ff;"></span>

</ul>

Fonts

Primary font: "Source Sans Pro", "Helvetica", "Arial", sans-serif;

Primary font italic: "Source Sans Pro", "Helvetica", "Arial", sans-serif;

Primary font bold: "Source Sans Pro", "Helvetica", "Arial", sans-serif;

HTML

									
										<div class="fonts">
<p>Primary font: "Source Sans Pro", "Helvetica", "Arial", sans-serif;</p>
<p><em>Primary font italic: "Source Sans Pro", "Helvetica", "Arial", sans-serif;</em></p>
<p><strong>Primary font bold: "Source Sans Pro", "Helvetica", "Arial", sans-serif;</strong></p>
</div>
